channel.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
channel.description:
i realized this the other day, i also realized i hadn't ever beat quake 2, so i did that this week
doom quake duke nukem half life unreal tomb raider
i havent beat the full quake 1 yet, but since i didnt buy it im not too worried about it.

doom

duke nukem
half life
unreal

You know your history, very good

item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: moe
item.description:
i ment to say that ive pretty much have only played these games and their sequels. i say their the same game because they are ( with a few exceptions)
duke nuke- aliens stole women
doom- demons from hell are causing havoc
quake- well, thats the exeption
half life- your a scientist who shoots guns and solves puzzles
tomb raider- you steal tresure and kill mummies

ive tried other games but i never got into them also, i dont have much time to play games.

also, your life is better now that you play video games? ok.

ill check into looking glass

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: poptartfrommars
item.description:
dinnsfire5:

He’s just telling us a fancy fact, dude. I thought it was interesting, I’ve had hundreds of video games, so its pretty interesting to see someone who’s still stuck with the classics.

Thank you for sharing it with us.

Gargantura Protecting another.

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
I still play diablo 2 and warcraft 3 and old resident evil games … wait a minute, Im not the only one Im not the only one!

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

I gotta admit, I play the same couple of classics too. I’ll often find myself playing Half-life, Jedi Knight II, Starcraft, Warcraft II, and Resident Evil and Silent Hill 2 again and time again. I think it’s because games today suck so severely that old games are the only thing to keep our attention over the years.

That’s probably why there’s so damn many remakes of old games.

I find myself playing KOTOR, Metal Gear Solid, any of the Jedi Knight series, and Half Life a lot though.

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
For the last five years or so, I only play Valve games based in the Half-Life universe.

I’m not much of a gamer.

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: Twinsen
item.description:
I am playing all the time the half-life saga, Portal saga, Dark Forces saga (incluiding Jedi knight II and Outcast) Tomb Raider: Last revelation and no more. But I have played the great Quake II only some years ago and some games of the Game boy. But actually I only play the firsts games. I hope that some day could play again Little Big Adventure I an II some day :3

Read full topic

item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
My problems with the new games are that they cost the same as before but instead of helluva long game time you get some linear shit or button mashing which can be played through in 6-7 hours. For example: Force Unleashed 2.Games in my country cost 12k Forints which is a lot, we don’t earn too much… Why pay 1/8 of my payment for a game I can finish in an afternoon?

Read full topic
item.source: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years

item.title: I've been playing the same 6 games for 15 years
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
I’ve played at least 50 games in the past ten years and am better for it. You’re an idiot if you only stick to a few, and even more so if you stick to “classics”.
